content.raw:
Hi!

One possible reason I can think of is the following: when you don't specify the `formula` argument, its default value depends on `remove_decoy`. So, in these two cases different formulas are used for FDR calculation \(decoys/targets vs 2\*decoys/total\). This could possibly result in the difference you see with your file. To check if this is the reason, try specifying which formula you want to use in both cases. If that is not the reason, I would appreciate if you could share the file so that I can look into the problem.
